metadata.title: CVE-2014-0123 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The wiki subsystem in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.9, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 does not properly restrict (1) viewand (2) edit access, which allows remote authenticated users to performwiki operations by leveraging the student role and using the RecentActivity block to reach the individual wiki of an arbitrary student.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.5').
